page.title: 11A Day in My Life
page.content: I get up and get dressed about 8 o'clock. Then I have breakfast and clean my teeth. I walk to{school } and at 9 o'clock the whistle goes and school begins. We always start the school day with prayers. In the morning, we do maths and English and in the afternoon we do our projects,art and craft or games. Our school day is broken by two play times: one in the morning and one in the afternoon, while at 12 o'clock we go for lunch.Our lunch break lasts for an hour. Then the whistle is blown to tell us it is time for school to begin again. At half past three, school finishes and I go home for my tea. Between tea and bedtime, I'll either play or watch television. I usually go to bed at half past 8.
